answer:
In BC, the routine schedule for children (6 years of age and younger) is here. A healthcare provider will tell you which vaccines she needs now based on her age, immunization record and any health conditions. Find a health unit near you to book an immunization appointment here.
Immunization Nurse
question: My child missed her age 4 vaccination. She was otherwise up to date. She is 6 almost 7 now. What do I do?
